remarks: Founded Induction schema, using implicit substitution.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 6-Feb-2011.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2015.)
statement:
frins3.1 $e |- R Fr A $.
frins3.2 $e |- R Se A $.
frins3.3 $e |- ( y = z -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
frins3.4 $e |- ( y = B -> ( ph <-> ch ) ) $.
frins3.5 $e |- ( y e. A -> ( A. z e. Pred ( R , A , y ) ps -> ph ) ) $.
frins3 $p |- ( B e. A -> ch ) $.
$d A y z $.
$d B y $.
$d R y z $.
$d ch y $.
$d ph z $.
$d ps y $.
